concept.title: TMEngine
concept.shortdesc: TMEngine is an open source Translation Memory (TM) manager written in Java.

conbody.p: TMEngine can be used in two ways:

ul.li: As an embedded library that manages translation memories in a Java application;
As a standalone TM server via its REST API.

conbody.p: The standalone server runs on these platforms:

ul.li: Linux (any version capable of running Java 11)

conbody.p: The .jar files included in TMEngine distributions are compiled with Java 11.
